name: New Beat Fund - What's it all for?

metadata.description:
The modern person’s internal questionnaire:
what’s it all for?
am i doing the most?
compared to everybody else?
can i… ?
will i… ?
what if… ?
the 
list
goes
on
and 
on 
and
on…

Too often do we get stuck in this cycle, lost in it’s feedback until our thoughts become a piercing hiss. Is searching for something that matters comparatively to societies expectations of happiness, success, beauty, freedom, etc. “healthy”? How can we re-examine our internal dialogue to project a “healthier” reality that may have been there all along? 

Sure, making music is a form of therapy to help cope with these questions; providing a space for ourselves to explore without boundaries or judgement. Furthermore, sharing that music can allow it’s listener to sort through some existential questions of there own. Divert a crisis perhaps, gain a new perspective, reach for forgiveness instead of anger, or simply alleviate life’s struggles for 3 brief minutes. Enjoy! 


Written, Produced, Mixed, & Mastered by NBF at our studio at the legendary Sound City Center in Van Nuys, CA. 

Artwork by Jeffery LaLiberté

lyrics.text:
What’s it all for? 
Am I doin the most?
Compared to everybody else
I can’t look at myself 
So shatter my bones
& measure my soul
Hold it up to the world
And let me go 

Lost in Myself 
Looking for inspiration 
Freedom rings 
Like a notification 

The poets crying 
While the fingers rage
Fishin for headlines
On the popular page

Fear of missin out on something better
Got ya jealous of the fortune teller
If I meet my maker ima tell her
Fuck I don’t care 

What’s it all for? 
Am I doin the most?
Compared to everybody else
I can’t look at myself 
So shatter my bones
& measure my soul
Hold it up to the world
And let me go 

The moral police forgot 
to brush their teeth
The earths been cancelled 
By the peoples disease

Did you see the verdict 
Do you hv an opinion 
Hallelujah god 
We believe in the fiction 

Fear of missin out on something better
Got ya jealous of the fortune teller
If I meet my maker ima tell her
Fuck I don’t care 

Drop top lift off criss cross that
Rhine stone wrist watch flip phone yea
Wake up do a little dance like yea 
I just wanna B take a chance like yea

Love a lazy day practice what I preach 
Make a little bread got it for the cheese
Pack a bag make a bad girl leave
I don’t wanna job I just wanna live free 

What’s it all for? 
Am I doin the most?
Compared to everybody else
I can’t look at myself 
So shatter my bones
& measure my soul
Hold it up to the world
And let me go

metadata.title: What's it all for?
